instructions:
In medium saucepan, combine 1-1/4 cups water, butter, ginger, cinnamon and contents of Spice Sack; bring to a boil.
Stir in couscous, apricots, raisins and green onion. Cover; remove from heat. Let stand 5 minutes. Fluff lightly with a fork.
title: Apricot Ginger Couscous
ingredients: 1 (5.8 ounce) package NEAR EAST® Roasted Garlic & Olive Oil Couscous mix
